Package dontlookback

Class PlayerProfile

java.lang.Object
dontlookback.PlayerProfile
public class PlayerProfile extends Object
Player Profile and Game Save System Manages persistent storage of player data, game settings, and progress. Provides save/load functionality for game state continuity across sessions. Features: - Player profile management - Game progress tracking - Settings persistence - Multiple save slots - Auto-save functionality - Data integrity checks
Version:
1.0
Author:
DLB Team

      Parameters:
      slot - save slot number (0-4)

      Returns:
      true if successfully saved

Don't Look Back - Horror Survival Game Engine

Built with Java 17, LWJGL 3.3.4, JBox2D | GitHub Repository | Report Issues
